bug.short_desc: release matrix table document - a few errors

long_desc.thetext:
1. in the release-test-matrix-applications.html document, API Viewer section, Toggling via toolbar (pub/prot/priv, ...) should be "Toggling via toolbar (pub/prot/priv/intern, ...)"
2. the numbering is bad in the matrix 6.13 5.14 6.14 5.14: Check that there is a warning when code is getting lost (unsaved changes)
3. in the release-test-matrix-create_application.html file: Create Application
source-each -> there is no such job on generate.py but it is a column of the table. I think it should say source-hybrid instead.
Thomas, please check that source-each stuff mentioned and assign the bug to gabi for the API-viewer part.

(In reply to comment #2) > 1. in the release-test-matrix-applications.html document, API Viewer section, > Toggling via toolbar (pub/prot/priv, ...) should be "Toggling via toolbar > (pub/prot/priv/intern, ...)"
I changed it a bit, but this is not meant to be an exhaustive list. Everybody should be able to understand that it is about testing the visibility toggles of the toolbar, whatever their number and concrete names may be. (Also don't want to adapt this description with every change of the GUI).
> > 2. the numbering is bad in the matrix > 6.13 > 5.14 > 6.14 > 5.14: Check that there is a warning when code is getting lost (unsaved changes)
Fixed.
> > 3. in the release-test-matrix-create_application.html file: > Create Application > > source-each -> there is no such job on generate.py but it is a column of the > table. I think it should say source-hybrid instead.
Fixed.
With r28963.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
